module.title: Resource: XMPP (Jabber)
module.description:
Support for XMPP protocol.
This module enables other modules to communicate via XMPP (Jabber).
module.author: Christian Würker

config.name: active
config.title: Enable support to send XMPP messages

config.name: sender.domain
config.title: Hostname or IP of XMPP server

config.name: sender.node
config.title: Name of user or node on XMPP server

config.name: sender.password
config.title: Password of user or node on XMPP server
